jokes.joke:
The Talking Dog for Sale:

A man sees a sign in front of a house: "Talking Dog for Sale." Curious, he rings the bell, and the owner directs him to the backyard where the dog is sitting.

"So, you can talk?" the man asks.

"Yep," the dog replies.

"That's amazing! Tell me your story."

The dog says, "Well, I discovered my gift of talking as a pup and wanted to serve my country. I worked for the CIA as a top-secret spy. I traveled the world, eavesdropping on conversations, and helped catch bad guys. When I got older, I decided to settle down and became a therapy dog at a hospital. And now I’m retired."

The man is stunned. He returns to the owner and asks, "How much for the dog?"

"Ten dollars."

"Only ten dollars? Why so cheap?"

The owner shrugs and says, "He's a liar. He didn’t do any of that stuff."

The Parrot with a Secret

A woman buys a parrot from a pet store. The store owner warns her, "This parrot used to live in a house of ill repute, so he might say some inappropriate things."

Excited, the woman takes the parrot home and places him in his cage.

The parrot looks around and says, "New house, new madam."

Shocked but amused, the woman laughs it off.

Later, her two daughters come home, and the parrot exclaims, "New girls! Hi, ladies!"

Before the woman can react, her husband walks through the door, and the parrot squawks, "Hi, Larry!"

The Cow and the Farmer 

A city slicker visits a farm and notices a cow with a wooden leg. Curious, he asks the farmer, "Why does that cow have a wooden leg?"

The farmer replies, "That’s Bessie, the most amazing cow! Last year, she saved my son from drowning. And last month, she alerted us to a fire in the barn."

"Wow, that’s incredible!" the visitor says. "But what does that have to do with her wooden leg?"

The farmer grins and says, "Well, when you have a cow that special, you don’t eat her all at once."

The Clever Cat 

A man walks into a bar with his cat. He orders a drink, and the cat hops onto the counter and starts talking to the bartender. Everyone is amazed.

"How did you teach your cat to talk?" someone asks.

The man replies, "Oh, we just spend a lot of time together. He picked it up."

The cat interrupts, "Don't believe him. I learned it from watching YouTube."

The Owl’s Wisdom 

A young bird asks an old owl, "Why do humans think you're so wise?"

The owl replies, "It's because I always listen before I speak."

"That's it?" asks the bird.

"Well," says the owl, "that and the glasses."

The Racing Snail 

A man buys a snail for a pet and decides to remove its shell to make it faster. The snail moves even slower than before.

Confused, the man says, "What's wrong?"

The snail replies, "I feel a little sluggish."

The Lost Dog 

A man walks into a bar with a worried expression. He says, "Has anyone seen my dog? He's blind in one eye, missing a leg, and answers to the name 'Lucky.'"

The bartender chuckles, "With all that, how's he lucky?"

"Because," the man replies, "he found his way home from three towns over last time!"

The Frog in the Library 

A frog hops into a library and says, "Read it! Read it!"

The librarian gives the frog a book, and it hops away. The next day, the frog comes back and says, "Read it! Read it!"

This goes on for a week until the librarian decides to follow the frog. She sees it give the book to a large pond full of frogs, who all croak, "Read it! Read it!"

The Talking Horse 

A man finds a talking horse for sale. The horse says, "I can talk, and I've lived an amazing life. I was a racehorse, won trophies, and later became a therapy horse."

The man says to the owner, "Why are you selling him for only $50?"

The owner says, "Because he's lying. He's never even left the barn."

The Penguin’s Adventure 

A penguin drives his car to the mechanic and goes to a nearby ice cream shop while waiting. He orders a big sundae, but because he has flippers, he gets ice cream all over his face.

When he returns to the mechanic, the mechanic says, "It looks like you blew a seal."

The penguin wipes his face and says, "No, it's just ice cream."
